game.title: The Lost Treasure
game.objective: Find the hidden treasure in the maze
game.description: You've received a map leading to a lost treasure hidden within a maze. Solve the puzzles and navigate through the labyrinth to claim your reward.

task.objective: Solve the riddle at the entrance
task.description: 解读门口的谜语以进入迷宫

task.objective: Find the key to the treasure chamber
task.description: A key hidden somewhere in the maze will unlock the door to the treasure room.
